name: 特里西娅·塔特尔
name_full: 特里西娅·塔特尔 Tricia Tuttle

last_movies.title: 第75届柏林国际电影节颁奖典礼
德拉·德比郡：神话与传奇磁带

introduction: Tricia Tuttle (born 1970) is an American festival programmer.Tuttle was born in 1970 in North Carolina. She earned a bachelor's degree from the University of North Carolina, and a masters in film studies from the British Film Institute (BFI).In 1997, she relocated to the United Kingdom. She worked as a programmer for The Script Factory and the London Lesbian and Gay Film Festival. Afterwards, she served as senior manager of BAFTA for five years until she was hired as BFI deputy head of festivals in 2013. From 2018 to 2022, she helmed the BFI London Film Festival. She took over the directionship of the Berlin International Film Festival on 1 April 2024.
